name: Salio's Clamber
description:
Employ your cards in the most cost-effective way possible in order to climb your way up the endless mountain, and to the unfathomable peak. You have a limited number of points you can spend on cards of different costs, use them wisely. 

HOW TO INSTALL AND PLAY

After downloading the zip file, extract it using archiver extractors such as 7-Zip or Winrar. Next, go into the dist folder and open 'Salio's Clamber.exe', and enjoy the game :)

UNDERSTANDING THE GAME

Over time, the pressure on Salios gets to her as the speed at which she has to climb increases. At times, the pressure breaks the limit of the speed she can climb at. Therefore, she needs to use her trusty cards to help her break the pressure, double her strength and boost her. However, there is a limit to how many cards she can use at a time with limited points to spend. 

NOTE

Read the 'README.txt' to understand the controls.
